meanings.sent1: The magic cloak granted him invisibility from his enemies.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's power of invisibility helped him sneak past the guards.
meanings.sent3: Invisibility would be handy during hide-and-seek, but it might make winning too easy!
meanings.sent4: The fog wrapped the city in a blanket of invisibility, hiding it from view.
meanings.sent5: The concept of invisibility is fascinating to scientists studying camouflage in nature.

meanings.definition: The quality of being impossible to see.
meanings.sent1: The spy relied on the invisibility of his stealth suit to complete the mission.
meanings.sent2: The chameleon's natural invisibility in its environment amazed the onlookers.
meanings.sent3: Invisibility in a game of tag would make the game last forever!
meanings.sent4: The silence of the night added an eerie invisibility to the dark alley.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of invisibility in her painting of a ghostly figure.
